articles.title: Football tourney culminates at NIT Srinagar
articles.description: Excelsior Sports Correspondent SRINAGAR, Sept 22: The Inter-Hostel Football Tournament (Men) at the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Srinagar culminated with great enthusiasm and competitive spirit. Organized by the Students Activity & Sports (SAS) Centre, the event featured 8 hostel teams vying for the title. In a thrilling final match, the 2nd-year team emerged victorious by defeating the 3rd-year team by 1-0. The winning goal was scored in the second half by Yameen Gatto, sealing the championship. The tournament was […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Sports Correspondent

articles.title: China's third aircraft carrier completes first electromagnetic catapult trials for fighter jets
articles.description: BEIJING, Sep 22 : China’s navy on Monday announced that three carrier-based aircraft have for the first time successfully carried out electromagnetic catapult-assisted take-off and landing from the country’s third aircraft carrier, the Fujian. Fujian, which is gearing up for its official induction, is the first among the three Chinese aircraft carriers equipped with the electromagnetic aircraft launch system (EMALS), a technology so far used only by US carriers. Carrier-based aircraft J-15T, J-35 and KongJing-600 have successfully completed their inaugural […]
articles.content:
BEIJING, Sep 22 : China’s navy on Monday announced that three carrier-based aircraft have for the first time successfully carried out electromagnetic catapult-assisted take-off and landing from the country’s third aircraft carrier, the Fujian.

articles.title: US asks judge to break up Google’s advertising technology monopoly
articles.description: Google’s lawyers countered that the government’s proposals were extreme. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
ALEXANDRIA, Va. – The Justice Department said on Sept 22 that Google should be broken up to address its monopoly in advertising technology, kicking off a hearing that could reshape the technology giant’s power online.
Judge Leonie M. Brinkema of the ... [2231 chars]

articles.title: S&P 500 hits another record! Bank of America predicts US tech to charge higher
articles.description: Since April, the S&P 500 has rallied strongly. Bank of America predicts further upside for US technology stocks.
articles.content:
Last night, the S&P 500 Index (SP: .INX) soared to another all-time high.
The index, which tracks the 500 largest companies in America, reached 6,698.88 in intraday trading before closing at 6,693.75 points.
The S&P 500 has now risen 14% for the year... [2455 chars]
